title: Finding products without sales by using DAX
excerpt: Analyze the performance of different DAX techniques to identify any products without sales in an area or a time period.  Article and download: https://sql.bi/814158?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/?aff=yt
